messages.title: Yarr's Return
messages.body: Blakebeard’s ghost is having trouble fitting in with the other ghost pirates. He has no legacy to draw from and Ray wants to help him out!

messages.title: HOT MIX!
messages.body: Drop the hottest of mixes with the Hot Mix Pistol! Fire a pair of Sonic Blasts that pierce enemies.

messages.title: Impostor
messages.body: Search the newly discovered Blasted Badlands for a true Hero! Train Dennis to become a warrior in the new Blasted Badlands Venture Zone to unlock Homebase’s own burger boss!
